form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Petition to Immigration and Naturalization Service for Adjustment of Status,, Form I-130.

full_text: Bombay UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form Approved Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB NO. 43-RO 401 PETITION JUL 13 Fee Stamp 83 PLEASE NOTE CLASSIFY STATUS YOU ARE THE PETITIONER ELATIVE FOR IMMIGRATION & ALI AND YOUR RELATIVE NATURALIZATION SERVICE ISSUANCE OF IMMIGRANT VISA 2 AUG 1983 IS THE DENVER, COLORADO BENEFICIARY SLB CHECKED JUL 2 8 1983 NON0367412 1. Name of beneficiary (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 2. Do Not Write in This Space 3. Names, birthdates and countries of birth of IRANi FRENT HORMUSJI beneficiary's children: 4. Other names used: (including maiden name if married) FRENT MERWAN IRAVi (MON) I-650 5. Country of beneficiary's birth 6. Date of beneficiary's birth (Month, day, year) INDIA DECEMBER 4, 1906 7. My name is: (Last, in CAPS) (First) (Middle) 8. My phone number is: IRANI RUSTAM HORMUED 9. Other names used: (including maiden name if married woman) 10. Relationship of beneficiary to myself Rusi & Russ (NICKNAMES) MOTHER 11. I was born: (Month) (Day) (Year) in: (Town or city) (State or Province) (Country) DECEMBER, 19/7 BOMBAY MAHARASHTRA 12. If you are a citizen of the United States, give the following: a. Citizenship was acquired: (Check one) through birth in the U.S. through parents through naturalization through marriage (1) If acquired through naturalization, give name under which naturalized, number of naturalization certificate, and date and place of naturalization: RUSTAN HORMUED IRAVi 8505568 Nov. 19, 1965 DENVER, (2) If known, my former alien registration was A UNKNOWN (3) If acquired through parentage or marriage, have you obtained a certificate of citizenship in your own name (a) If so, give number of certificate and date and place of issuance: APPLICABLE (b) if not, submit evidence of citizenship in accordance with instruction 3 a (2) 30 13. If you are a lawful permanent resident alien of the United States, give the following: a. Alien Registration Number: N/A b. Date, place, and means of admission for lawful permanent residence N/A. A- 14. Beneficiary's marital status: 15. Name of beneficiary's spouse, if married, and date and country of birth (Omit this item if petition is Married Widowed Divorced Single for your spouse) DECEASED 16. Full address of beneficiary's spouse and children, if any (Omit this item if petition is for your spouse) N/A 17. If this petition is for your spouse or child, give the following: a. Date and place of your present marriage b. Names of my prior spouses C. Names of spouse's prior spouses N/A 18. Has this beneficiary ever been in the U.S.? YES NO (FOR VISITS) N/A N/A 19. Are beneficiary and petitioner related by adoption? YES NO (CONTINUE WITH ITEM 20 ON REVERSE)- OATH OR AFFIRMATION OF PETITIONER I swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this petition signed by me and that the statements herein are true and correct. Signature of petitioner (See Instruction No. 5) X Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this 13 day of fily 19 83, (SEAL) My commission expires (SIGNATURE OF OFFICER ADMINISTERING OATH) (TITLE) SIGNATURE OF PERSON PREPARING FORM IF OTHER THAN PETITIONER I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the petitioner and is based on all information of which I have any knowledge. (SIGNATURE) (ADDRESS) (DATE) 05-13-83 RECEIVED TRANS. IN RET'D. TRANS. OUT COMPLETED FORM I-130 (Rev. 10-26-79) N
